publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7280.1 Johann Lamont: Alasdair Gray Rejects Lib Dem Cutsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-7280) in the name of Bob Doris, leave out from "Mr Gray" to end and insert "it therefore regrets that SNP leader Alex Salmond recommended to voters in England that voting Liberal Democrat in the 2010 general election would be "a legitimate and proper thing to do", and calls on him to admit his mistake publicly and apologise accordingly." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-7280.1 Alasdair Gray Rejects Lib Dem Cuts (lodged on 2 November 2010) Charlie Gordon*, David Whitton*, Karen Gillon*, Rhona Brankin*, Trish Godman*, Paul Martin*, John Park*
S3M-7280.1 Alasdair Gray Rejects Lib Dem Cuts (lodged on 2 November 2010) Hugh Henry*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Mulligan*, Marlyn Glen*, Cathy Peattie*, Mr Frank McAveety*
